title: Black Beast
description: She walks the line between the hunter and the hunted.Vampires want her blood.Witches consider her less-than-human.Slayers simply want her dead.As if being in high school wasn't hard enough, Catherine Pierce has to deal with a whole other set of problems that arise from being a shifter that hasn't settled. Because after puberty, shifters are supposed to stop changing--and Catherine, well, hasn't.Even among her own kind, Catherine is regarded as a freak.To make matters worse, she'd caught the attention of the witches' Council because they think she's been dabbling in dark magic because of a stupid old book that popped up at her work. And she's been having nightmares about a terrifying man who calls himself the Shadow Thane and plans to end the world in a burst of darkness and dragon fire.Just in case that wasn't enough, a branch of Slayers are infiltrating Catherine's town, under the guise of a community youth group called Sterling Rep.Times are changing and that means, for Catherine, it's time to Change.
author: Nenia Campbell
